raw_comment: Notice and wonder is teh key to the data collected for the phenology shown in this graph. It's what I do all day long with my Art of Paying Attention pieces that I create as a wildlife illustrator, storyteller, and certified Environmental  Educator.  I invite everyone to do the same. Students and teachers are welcome to  look and listen to my  NPR  pieces athttps://www.bethsurdut.com/critters.html
ace_sentences: Noticing is a key to the data that is collected for phenology.
Wondering is a key to the data that is collected for phenology.
I am a certified environmental educator.
I do this all day long.
I invite everyone to do the same.
Students are welcome to look at my NPR pieces.
Students are welcome to listen to my NPR pieces.
Teachers are welcome to look at my NPR pieces.
Teachers are welcome to listen to my NPR pieces.
The URL of my NPR pieces is https://www.bethsurdut.com/critters.html.
